meanings.sent1: Using allergy shots can hyposensitize your body to pollen.
meanings.sent2: The doctor hyposensitizes the patient to cat dander by giving small doses over time.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing cat was hyposensitized to feathers, now it can cuddle with pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chocolate hyposensitizes her to the bitter taste of medicine.
meanings.sent5: The gradual exposure to sunlight hyposensitizes the skin to prevent sunburn.

meanings.definition: Treat with gradually increasing doses of an allergen to reduce sensitivity.
meanings.sent1: The allergist hyposensitizes the patient to peanuts to prevent severe reactions.
meanings.sent2: To build immunity, the doctor hyposensitizes the child to bee venom.
meanings.sent3: The bakery hyposensitizes customers to gluten by offering small samples.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude hyposensitizes her to negative comments.
meanings.sent5: The gradual exposure to heights hyposensitizes the person to their fear of falling.
